articles.description: Google is becoming one of the Wikimedia Foundation’s first Enterprise customers. The service will give Google more efficient access to large amounts of data from Wikimedia and Wikipedia.
articles.content:
Becoming one of the first Wikimedia Enterprise customers
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Google is paying the Wikimedia Foundation to help serve up the most accurate and up-to-date informat… [+3046 chars]
